attributes.action: Instate a public holiday for Gay,Lesbian, Transexual/Transgender and Bisexual people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It shall be a publicly recognised Day for all Gay, Lesbian, Transgender/Transgender and Bisexual people and their struggle for acceptance through the years. It shall be a Public Holiday therefore hopefully instating confidence in the General Public that we are not all a bunch of crazy and freaky individuals who should be kept at bay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
